a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Share of Top 1% in Pre-tax national income vs. Gini coefficient, 1967 to
The Gini coefficient measures inequality on a scale between 0 and 1, where higher values indicate greater inequality.
Share of Top 1% in Pre-tax national income
Source: World Wealth and Income Database (2018), World Bank PIP
Note: Depending on the country and year, the data relates to either income or expenditure.
